about_the_game:
Jackalope is a psychological horror, with supernatural elements.

You have to survive in a dangerous forest and not go crazy, defend yourself from monsters,
solve puzzles and be prepared for the worst.

You can play Jackalope alone or with your friends (up to 4 people)

The more players the more difficult survival will be for you, you must become a team to survive in this forest
  • Unite to survive
  • Solve puzzles
  • Look for something that will help you get out
  • Decide what is happening in the forest

Know that you are not alone

name: Jackalope

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Jackalope - is a psychological horror, with supernatural elements. You have to survive in a dangerous forest and not go crazy, defend yourself from monsters, solve puzzles and be prepared for the worst. You can play Jackalope alone or with your friends (up to 4 people).
supported_languages: English, French, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Japanese
